titleStmt.title: A commentarie or exposition vpon the first chapter of the prophecy of Amos delivered in xxi. sermons in the parish church of Meisey Hampton in the diocesse of Gloucester, by Sebastian Benefield ... Hereunto is added a sermon vpon 1. Cor. 9.19. wherein is touched the lawfull vse of things indifferent.
titleStmt.author: Benefield, Sebastian, 1559-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold by Iohn Barnes dwelling neere Holborne Conduit [, London],

notesStmt.note: "A sermon preached at Wotton under Edge" has separate title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
